pr_title: Converting swagger and graphQL to postman collection in developer portal feature added

timeline.bodyText: Instead of require shall we use imports
timeline.author: Krishanx92

timeline.message: change done from require to import

timeline.bodyText: Why this is getting from output[0]? any specific reason?
timeline.author: Krishanx92

replies.bodyText: one reason I used it as [0] is that it is given in the sample code of the library. Another reason is that we cannot get output without [0] or putting any other number.
replies.author: Tharanidk
